value:
I can't believe that I came out of your
weapon. This realm is so different than
my home, the Kingdom of Hoshido!

I serve Lady Sakura, whose grace is
peerless. She is patient even in the
face of my worst imperfections.

Your patrols in this large place must
be very exacting. I'd be glad to do
my part anytime you need rest.

You'll find that I try to perform
perfectly in battle. And I vow to
try even harder for your sake.

You may detect a floral scent from me.
Sorry if it troubles your nose. It's a
hair tonic made from camellia blooms.

Hello there. I'm positive that you must
be $Nu.$k$pYes? Good. I bring you brightest
greetings from your fine friend
$Nf!
I'm really coming along, right?
This will do just fine for now.
Perhaps I should practice more.

Thank you for helping me get a
little closer to perfection.

I am Subaki, a Sky Knight from the
Kingdom of Hoshido. I'm perfectly
delighted to answer your call.

You and I have been in battle
plenty of times now. Haven't we,
$Nu?$k$pI'm sure you've seen me make
little mistakes now and then.
It's only natural.$k$pBut it still bothers me, especially
here where I rank among the
Heroes called upon in this world.$k$pI feel like I must be even more
perfect here than back home.$k$pAnd you, Great Hero! You must be
under an even greater pressure
to be the best...of the best!$k$pWhat? You say sometimes your
tactics aren't up to snuff?$k$pAha! How wonderful. You and I have
been hiding our little failures. Well,
your secret is safe with me.$k$pWe will help each other achieve
total perfection. Until then, you
can count on me—absolutely!
はいっ！
せやっ！
うあっ！
Drat...
It's all me!
Watch and learn!
Expect perfection!
You will fail. Not I!
So close...
Heehee
Gracious thanks, friend, for any and all concern!
I'm the perfect partner, whether in battle or simply socializing.
If I have any flaws, it's that I fuss too much over my appearance.
You can rely on me to do a thing right. I assume that's why you summoned me.
What? That wasn't my stomach growling. You must be mistaken.
Where is Lady Sakura? I must serve her well, even in her absence.
Perfection is a fool's errand. I suppose that makes me the perfect fool!
Yes?
Absolutely.
Let's go.
